body: @Hold My Beer Kiddies chill my g, this ain't a netflix drama
Yeah this isn't much of NTR rather than cheating.

Just great stuff!  I'm of the school that if you neglect your wife to the point she can't remember the last time the two of you had sex, YOU are the one being unfaithful, because you've violated your DUTY as a man, which is to make sure your woman is as satisfied as she wants. A wife is not a slave to do your bidding or a piece of furniture; she's your partner. Husband here is totally at fault, and even admits it. IRL, if your spouse is working away from home, or deployed overseas, that's a forced situation, and requires extra work to keep the love flowing, but in and of itself isn't an excuse for cheating.  The last two stories are nice and uncomplicated: A widowed hairdresser teaches a young customer how to do it right, and a married couple end a sexless streak. The last story works as a perfect bookend for how NOT to end up the husband in the first story. Super hot MILFs here!

One of the best doujin series I've ever read. I wonder if someone out there would be kind enough to uncensor and color this masterpiece.
By the way, anyone have suggestions similar to this? And by this, I mean a doujin series wherein a married MILF falls in love and starts an affair with a younger man.
Also, is her hair suppose to be black or brown? I'm pretty sure it's black but the cover makes it seem to be brown
They need to make a video to this!
That last story was great yea man treat your wife don't neglect her the total antithesis to the usual NTRMC lol. loved it. And yea the other before it was good too.

Idk the story started good it focused more on the wife's guilt which was a different take that I was enjoying but man did it fall apart in the latter half. The daughter str8 up taking the mother's side when both parents were at fault and it was infidelity that just lazy to me no conflict came from that. I wanted to see something between the daughter and the mother but nope just got rid of any potential story there, lame. Then the friend got married but "oh no, her new husband cheated" just to justify HER infidelity at the end like talk about boring and again lazy. By that point I was just racing to the finish, wanting it to end but I guess the ending and her last monologue was nice. 5/10
@gustacos there is similar story of author SINK with red hair milf but i dont remember son fucking mother.
this is confusing. are the last 2 stories related to the main one?
This that's good shit, the thickness will never lie to me 🥰
